title: A Day in the Life of an Agentic Developer
summary: What does a typical day look like when you work alongside AI? From morning sketches to video editing, here's an honest look at how I use AI tools to multiply my output—without burning out.

title: Solving Business Process Messes: From Chaos to Clarity

title: What's Your AI Sampling Temperature?
summary: Discover how AI sampling temperature impacts creativity and reliability in language models. Learn about low vs high temperatures and their effects on AI output.

title: AI Video Editing Tool: From Chaos to Themes
